transcript: For example, a year and half ago, I decided to change my profession to data analytics. when I am moving to a new country. I chose a profession that is more in demand for this country. It was not difficult for me to retrain for a new specialty because I was comprehensively developed before that. I combined self-education and education-specialized courses. A new profession opens up new opportunity for me to realize in a new country.

openness.reason: moderate level of creativity and exploratory language

conscientiousness.reason: high level of organization and planning

extraversion.reason: moderate speech rate and medium energy level

neuroticism.reason: stable pitch and low frequency of pauses

motivation_strengths: medium motivation level and consistent tone
motivated to learn and develop skills
motivation_development_areas: varying tone to convey more emotion and emphasis
assessment.hr_summary: The candidate shows a strong fit for a data analytics role, with high conscientiousness and organization skills, moderate openness and creativity, and low neuroticism. Their motivation level is medium, with a consistent tone and a proactive mindset. However, they may need to work on increasing their enthusiasm and varying their tone to convey more emotion and emphasis.
